pdf.head:
<#assign regInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign emailInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign telInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign vatInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign logoInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign subsidiary>${record.subsidiary.id}</#assign>
  
        <#if subsidiary=="4">
              <#assign regInfo>Company Registration No: 06863317. Registered Office: Venture Park, Selborne Road, Alton, Hampshire, GU34 3HL, United Kingdom.</#assign>
              <#assign emailInfo>sales@swiftindustrial.co.uk</#assign>
              <#assign telInfo>01420 592500</#assign>
              <#assign vatInfo>GB 730 047 570</#assign>
              <#assign logoInfo>https://system.eu1.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=12&c=3865332_SB1&h=8c7ade4a997e5c95e9aa</#assign>
        </#if>
  
        <#if subsidiary=="9">
              <#assign regInfo>Company Registration No: 06683211. Registered Office: Maxx House, Western Road, Bracknell, Berkshire, RG12 1QP, United Kingdom.</#assign>
              <#assign emailInfo>accounts@traffiglove.com</#assign>
              <#assign telInfo>01344 207090</#assign>
              <#assign vatInfo>GB 938 0690 02</#assign>
              <#assign logoInfo>https://system.eu1.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=11&c=3865332_SB1&h=e0957c1448ab1bfcd5af</#assign>
        </#if>
  
    
        
            
    

	 
	 
	
    
    
    

	${record@title}
	 
	 
	
          
    

	

	 
	 
	 
	 
	
	

        Invoice Address:
${record.billaddress}
VAT Number: ${record.vatregnum}
	
      
    ${record.custbody_subsidiary_address}
VAT No. ${vatInfo}

Email: ${emailInfo}
Tel: ${telInfo}
	
          
        

        

        
          
Due Date: ${record.duedate?string["dd MMM yyyy"]}
          
Bank Details for payments in ${record.currency}:
          
${record.custbody_bbs_bank_account}
          
${record.custbody_bbs_bank_name}
          
Account Number: ${record.custbody_bbs_account_no}
          
Sort Code: ${record.custbody_bbs_sort_code}
          
IBAN: ${record.custbody_bbs_iban}
          
Swift Code: ${record.custbody_bbs_bic}
          
 
        

       
         

              Any queries or discrepancies must be reported within 3 days of dispatch date otherwise claims cannot be accepted.
		  
         

               
		  
          

              ${regInfo}
